td.content: s:a female retired aged 79 years presents with mild excessive thirst of 6 weeks duration together with mild increased urination, mild yeast infections, Diabetes. Denies ever using tobacco she drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 164 cm, Weight 64.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, appears in NAD a:Type 2 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metformin - 500 mg daily, and ordered fasting plasma glucose.
